about_the_game:
Add some style to your arsenal with these unique weapon skins.

P5T Weapon Pack includes:
• Picaro Sand Hawk
• Picaro Levinson M31
• Picaro Slingbow
• Picaro Machine Gun
• Picaro Assault Rifle
• Picaro Revolver
• Picaro G Launcher
• Picaro Machine Pistol
• & 2 addl. weapons

Each weapon will be added to the inventory according to your progress within the main story.

Contents will become accessible through game progression.
